typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		meta as (data_version as string, created as string, revision as integer),
		info as (balls_per_over as integer, city as string, dates as string[], event as (name as string, match_number as integer, group as string), gender as string, match_type as string, match_type_number as integer, officials as (match_referees as string[], reserve_umpires as string[], tv_umpires as string[], umpires as string[]), outcome as (winner as string, by as (wickets as integer)), overs as integer, player_of_match as string[], players as ({South Africa} as string[], Australia as string[]), registry as (people as ({A Nortje} as string, {A Zampa} as string, {AJ Finch} as string, {AK Markram} as string, {Ahsan Raza} as string, {D Pretorius} as string, {DA Miller} as string, {DA Warner} as string, {GJ Maxwell} as string, {H Klaasen} as string, {HE van der Dussen} as string, {J Srinath} as string, {JR Hazlewood} as string, {K Rabada} as string, {KA Maharaj} as string, {L Rusere} as string, {MA Gough} as string, {MA Starc} as string, {MP Stoinis} as string, {MR Marsh} as string, {MS Wade} as string, {Nitin Menon} as string, {PJ Cummins} as string, {Q de Kock} as string, {SPD Smith} as string, {T Bavuma} as string, {T Shamsi} as string)), season as string, team_type as string, teams as string[], toss as (decision as string, winner as string), venue as string),
		innings as (team as string, overs as (over as integer, deliveries as (batter as string, bowler as string, non_striker as string, runs as (batter as integer, extras as integer, total as integer))[])[], powerplays as (from as double, to as double, type as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename',
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> cricsheet
cricsheet foldDown(unroll(info.dates),
	mapColumn(
		dates = info.dates,
		filename
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattendates
cricsheet foldDown(unroll(info.teams),
	mapColumn(
		team = info.teams,
		filename
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenteams
cricsheet foldDown(unroll(info.officials.match_referees),
	mapColumn(
		filename
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
flattendates sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		filename as string,
		match_date as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['delete from s_dates'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		filename,
		match_date = dates
	)) ~> sinksdates
flattenteams sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		filename as string,
		team as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['delete from s_teams'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		filename,
		team
	)) ~> sinksteams
cricsheet sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		venue as string,
		event_name as string,
		match_number as integer,
		match_date as date,
		winner as string,
		toss_winner as string,
		toss_decision as string,
		player_of_match as string,
		filename as string,
		stage as string,
		match_group as string,
		winning_margin as string,
		eliminator as string,
		method as string,
		result as string,
		season as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['delete from s_matches'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		venue = info.venue,
		event_name = info.event.name,
		match_number = info.event.match_number,
		winner = info.outcome.winner,
		toss_winner = info.toss.winner,
		toss_decision = info.toss.decision,
		player_of_match = info.player_of_match,
		match_group = info.event.group,
		filename,
		season = info.season
	)) ~> sinkmatches
